description: Validation rules for the FAANG project. Rules are divided into one group that is applied to all analyses, and additional groups based on the analysis type
name: FAANG analysis metadata rules

rules.name: project
rules.description: State that the project is 'FAANG'

rules.name: assay type
rules.description: The type of experiment analysis data was derived from
valid_values: methylation profiling by high throughput sequencing
microRNA profiling by high throughput sequencing
transcription profiling by high throughput sequencing

rules.name: analysis protocol
rules.description: Link to the description of the analysis protocol, an overview of the full analysis including names, references and versions of any software employed. The protocol can refer to the order in which other protocols were performed and any intermediate steps not covered by any analysis specific protocols

rules.name: analysis code
rules.description: Link to the repository that contains the code used in the analysis. Ideally this would be formatted and documented for use by others, but even raw or undocumented code is encouraged as it will assist with reproducability

rules.name: reference genome
rules.description: The reference genome used in the analysis. Use 'not applicable' if a reference genome was not required for this analysis type. Contact FAANG DCC to add new reference assembly

rule_groups.name: ena
rule_groups.description: the fields required by the ENA analysis xsd https://github.com/FAANG/faang-metadata/blob/master/rulesets/faang_analyses.metadata_rules.json

rules.name: title
rules.description: the title of the analysis

rules.name: alias
rules.description: the alias of the analysis

rules.name: analysis type
rules.description: The type of analysis performed. Contact FAANG DCC to add a new analysis type

rules.name: description
rules.description: Describes the analysis in detail

rules.name: study
rules.description: Identifies the parent study.

rules.name: samples
rules.description: One or more samples associated with the analysis.

rules.name: experiments
rules.description: One or more experiments associated with the analysis.

rules.name: runs
rules.description: One or more runs associated with the analysis.

rules.name: related analyses
rules.description: One or more analyses associated with this analysis.

rules.name: file names
rules.description: The names of the files associated with this analysis, must have the same number as file types, checksum methods and checksums

rules.name: file types
rules.description: The types of the files associated with this analysis, must have the same number as file names, checksum methods and checksums

rules.name: checksum methods
rules.description: The checksum methods used on the files associated with this analysis, must have the same number as file names, file types and checksums

rules.name: checksums
rules.description: The checksum values of the files associated with this analysis, must have the same number as file names, file types and checksum methods

rules.name: analysis center
rules.description: If applicable, the center name of the institution responsible for this analysis.

rules.name: analysis date
rules.description: The date when this analysis was produced.
